DAG¶

DAG (Directed acyclic graph)

class ploomber.DAG(name=None, clients=None, differ=None, on_task_finish=None, on_task_failure=None, executor='serial')¶

A DAG is a collection of tasks with dependencies

Parameters

differ (CodeDiffer) – An object to determine whether two pieces of code are the same and to output a diff, defaults to CodeDiffer() (default parameters)
